page.title: 06BRICKENDON SEWAGE WORKS
page.content: Thames Water Authority,Hatfield Group. Local Authority;East Herts District Council. The Works serves the Brickendon area, which has a current population of 227,and deals with domestic effluent only, there being no trade discharge.The treated effluent is discharged to a tributary of the River Lea, while the sludge goes to Mill Green Sewage Works, Hatfield, for final treatment. The plant is gravity_fed, semi automatic & diesel powered; receiving 3 visits per week from mobile operators. The total throughput is approx. 9000 gallons per day. The plant's present load of 227 people is rather in excess of its designed capacity of 175 and it is under consideration for modernisation.
